line.comment: * Mordan4 - do not put them in the Renegades Sector.
* The last ship is an M6.
* fix attempt for bail cmd removing equipment sometimes
* Herobetty 5.4: Give flavor to abandoned ships. Ship spawns with 40% to 70% hull.
* Add-Ons 1.4.19: Fixed free M6 not spawning with the flag.

sval.val: Mordan4 - do not put them in the Renegades Sector.
The last ship is an M6.
fix attempt for bail cmd removing equipment sometimes
Herobetty 5.4: Give flavor to abandoned ships. Ship spawns with 40% to 70% hull.
Add-Ons 1.4.19: Fixed free M6 not spawning with the flag.
